scripts.build:addshebang: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > dist/index2.js && cat dist/index.js >> dist/index2.js && mv dist/index2.js dist/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:addshebang && npm run build:chmod
scripts.inspect: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector -- node dist/index.js
